subject: JUnitAssist - spike
msgSnippet: Functionality I would like to see in next generation testing tools is well summarized in one of the spikes I just recently did. By using Javassist together
messageBody:
Functionality I would like to see in next generation testing
tools is well summarized in one of the spikes I just recently did. By
using Javassist together with JUnit I managed to add a powerful yet
simple way of doing declarative (from the test-class) mocking of
troublesome classes in the class tree you are about to test.

Read about it here:
http://tobyonrails.blogspot.com/2005/09/junitassist-unfolds-catch-
22.html

Try it and tell me what you think.

Best regards,

Tobias Hill
Citerus AB
Sweden
